name: Joint War - [BETA]
description:
Play Joint War for free.

Created for first person shooter (FPS) enthusiasts, Joint War is a small scale but high risk game with infiltration, hostage rescue and bomb planting/defusing missions where you join strategies and skills with your friends to eliminate opponents.

JW, developed by Unreal Engine, is a free to play multiplayer FPS video game. Going into beta production in August, JW will target e-sports mechanics and gameplay improvements. All servers in MatchMaking and Rank modes are configured to be 128 tick and will continue to be so throughout broadcasting life. Feel free to reach out to us via in game communication forms and below social media channels during beta phase.

Thank you for your support.
